comment.text: Mediates apoptosis and actin stress fiber dissolution.
ATP + a protein = ADP + a phosphoprotein.
Ubiquitously expressed. Highest expression is found in heart and in skeletal muscle.
Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. STE Ser/Thr protein kinase family. STE20 subfamily.
Contaminating sequence. Potential poly-A sequence starting in position 611.
Contaminating sequence. Potential poly-A sequence starting in position 422.
Contaminating sequence. Potential poly-A sequence starting in position 614.

property.value: F:signal transducer, downstream of receptor, with serine/threonine kinase activity
